user_question: Can you tell me the history of the first color television broadcast and generate an image of a vintage color TV?
final_answer: The first color television broadcast occurred on June 25, 1951, by CBS. Image of a vintage color TV generated. The first program broadcast in color was a variety show called 'Premiere'.
